English: to come to a place on account of its reputation (idiom); attracted to visit a famous location
francais: (expr. idiom.) venir à un endroit en raison de sa réputation

d.f: `仰慕~`盛名~`而~`前來~`拜訪~。`多~`為~`客套~`的~`說法~。

English: to come to a place on account of its reputation (idiom); attracted to visit a famous location
francais: (expr. idiom.) venir à un endroit en raison de sa réputation
